content.title: Aortic Stump Blowout
content.description: Catastrophic dehiscence of aortic stump after extra-anatomic bypass for infection

key_concepts.details: Aortic graft infection requiring excision, AEF, inadequate stump reinforcement
Monofilament suture closure, omental/prevertebral fascia coverage, tissue reinforcement
Sudden abdominal/back pain, hypotension, often rapidly fatal
Emergency exploration if viable; consider in situ reconstruction to avoid stump

primary_sources: Reilly LM et al. J Vasc Surg 1987
